name: Igniqua
description:
A small pretty village called Amare is suddenly attacked by the evil magician Lavira. 

With her flying castle she is getting closer and closer to the village and it seems that she cannot be stopped anymore. Everything behind her is on fire and turns to ashes. 

The same fate now threatens the villagers of Amare, but the little elemental spirit Igniqua is determined to put an end to the approaching danger. With the power of fire and water, Igniqua is not afraid of any challenge. 

It's up to you, steer Igniqua through forests, villages and dungeons. 

Save Amare, save the world!

Personal:

This game was a so-called heart project. There were clear guidelines from our school and everyone had to create their own idea and concept in order to then design the game themselves. I wanted to develop a sympathetic character that can also be played well by children. I wish everyone a lot of fun with the game!
